Course Index:

```js
// add customClickEvent for event hadling
<CourseIndex
  course={{
    id: 1,
    step: 1,
    title: 'Introduction',
    sectionContent: [
      {
        id: 8,
        sectionContentType: {
          0: 'Lesson',
        },
        step: 1,
        title: 'Getting Started',
        sectionId: 1,
      },
      {
        id: 9,
        sectionContentType: {
          2: 'Challenge',
        },
        step: 2,
        title: 'Introduction Challenge',
        sectionId: 1,
      },
      {
        id: 1,
        sectionContentType: {
          1: 'Quiz',
        },
        step: 3,
        title: 'Introduction Quiz',
        sectionId: 1,
      },
      {
        id: 10,
        sectionContentType: {
          3: 'Example',
        },
        step: 4,
        title: 'Input and Output Example',
        sectionId: 1,
      },
    ],
  }}
/>
```
